0.title: The Robbery
0.plot: Gavin's planning a record Christmas Eve at Valco, but new employee Tim plans to take advantage of the situation.

1.title: Episode #7.1
1.plot: Join the Valco gang for a seventh series of supermarket shenanigans. A big announcement means a shake-up at the store and Gavin's not happy. Jason Watkins stars.

2.title: Episode #7.2
2.plot: Gavin struggles to hire a night manager as Valco gets set to open 24 hours. Scatty candidate Lou applies. And she could just be the final straw.

3.title: Episode #7.3
3.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

4.title: Episode #7.4
4.plot: It's the launch of Valco 24 and Lou's got a stunning night display up her sleeve. Hot newbie Craig means Linda's keen to work the first night shift.

5.title: Episode #7.5
5.plot: Gavin's in for a shock as his mum pays a surprise visit. Katie takes on the staff's appraisals. And she doesn't hold back when it comes to Colin.

6.title: Episode #7.6
6.plot: Gavin's out for answers when there's a fire during the night shift. Meanwhile, Lisa tries to make Colin's childhood dream a reality.

7.title: Episode #7.7
7.plot: Gavin's got some serious amends to make after Lou uncovers his devious plan. Brian gets more than he bargained for when he opens a pharmacy consultation room.

8.title: Episode #7.8
8.plot: Gavin makes the ultimate sacrifice in a desperate bid to fix things with Cheryl. Oblivious to the tension, Colin and Lisa plan their stag and hen dos.

9.title: The Wedding
9.plot: In the finale, Gavin and Cheryl plan to finally wed, but with a shady stag do the night before, will Gavin even make it to the ceremony? When the lads wake in Dublin, they must do everything they can to get Gavin back in time.

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Valco welcome new recruit Margaret whilst Julie tries to balance her work with arranging a special birthday meal. Meanwhile Katie decides to take pity on Kieran, having seen him make one fashion nightmare too many.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Kieran decides Andy's been single too long and embarks on finding him a girlfriend. Meanwhile, Julie feels threatened by the return of her old boss and Margaret has to face her fears and make an announcement over the tannoy.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Andy is on a harsh new fitness regime as he prepares to run the marathon for charity. Meanwhile Gavin makes Julie's year by finally giving her the Valco management handbook. Can she cope with the power?

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Gavin is away for the day leaving Julie in charge, a chance for some fun that Kieran can't let pass. Meanwhile Margaret tries to come to terms with the new salad bar and Andy's nose is put out of joint by a rival butcher.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Kieran has an attack of the green eyed monster as Katie becomes a bit too friendly with a visiting shopfitter. Meanwhile Julie thinks Gavin needs closure over the death of his wife and Margaret tries to get to grips with Skype.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Julie has a blast from the past when the visiting area manager turns out to be an old colleague. Margaret is thinking of going on holiday but doesn't know where to go and Kieran is growing a beard, much to the amusement of Katie and Andy.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Gavin struggles with the hangover from hell after a night out with Andy and Julie becomes suspicious of what exactly they got up to. Meanwhile, Kieran is worried about an ominous lunch with Emma.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: There's a buzz around the store as auditions are being held for the upcoming Valco advert. Julie struggles with interview nerves and Kieran starts making preparations for his upcoming wedding.

1.title: Episode #2.1
1.plot: It's Gavin's last day and Julie worries she may have already failed to impress new boss, Lorraine Chain.

2.title: Episode #2.2
2.plot: Gavin's out of the picture and Lorraine is now at the helm. She announces Valco's new below economy No nonsense range which Julie is clearly not a fan of.

3.title: Episode #2.3
3.plot: It's Gavin's first scheduled visit as area manager. Julie moans about the No Nonsense range and Lorraine gives her a chat about loyalty. Andy is annoyed when the meat counter is made to use a ticket machine.

4.title: Episode #2.4
4.plot: There's a flu bug going around and Lorraine sets about spreading staff across the store. She puts Leighton on a till, and he sells alcohol to some underage kids.

5.title: Episode #2.5
5.plot: When Leighton turns down the freezers, in a bid to reverse global warming, Lorraine makes Julie sack him. Leighton is heartbroken and Julie is left feeling guilty and alone.

6.title: Episode #2.6
6.plot: When Gavin finds out about Leighton's sacking, he finds a loophole to get him reinstated. Lorraine is livid and battle lines are drawn.

7.title: Episode #2.7
7.plot: Leighton�۪s thrilled to be back at work, though Lorraine�۪s less happy about it and sets about making Julie�۪s life unbearable. Julie finally cracks and has a little breakdown but Gavin swoops in and rescues her just in time.

8.title: Episode #2.8
8.plot: Gavin decides to work closely with Lorraine. They argue over staff searches and eventually Gavin makes Lorraine quit her job. The staff are thrilled.

9.title: Episode #2.9
9.plot: It's fire drill day and with Julie still off, Gavin has to manage it. But when he learns they didn't get Margaret out in time, he realises they need to get Julie back.

10.title: Episode #2.10
10.plot: Julie's back and Gavin's worried about leaving her on her own. At first it seems like she's not ready but with a bit of support from her manager, she manages to get back to her old self.

11.title: Episode #2.11
11.plot: Gavin's dog Chester went under a bus, and Gavin starts to make mistakes. He accidentally makes Leighton pin a staff wage sheet up on the notice board. There's minor revolt, but Gavin realises he's not happy, and something has to change.

12.title: Episode #2.12
12.plot: Gavin's interviewing for Lorraine's replacement and realises that he wants his old job back much to Julie's delight.

13.title: Episode #2.13
13.plot: It's the one millionth customer promotion, and Julie and Gavin are closer than ever. She starts to think something might finally happen, but when he reveals he has a new girlfriend, Julie's devastated.

14.title: Christmas Special
14.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Episode #3.1
1.plot: Gavin and Julie meet the supermarket strategist whose big plans for Valco don't work for everyone.

2.title: Episode #3.2
2.plot: Gavin and Richard clash over plans for the new Valco Better store. After a visit from Emma's dad, Kieran to consider moving to Newquay.

3.title: Episode #3.3
3.plot: A little gazebo called the suggestion fort goes up in the store. It's France's latest brainwave get the customers to say what they want from a Valco Better store, and Gavin's forced to be the sounding board.

4.title: Episode #3.4
4.plot: France launches his latest initiative - the fast lane an aisle for all the essentials, so you can quickly shop and go. It's even got its own till with an experienced checkout girl (Lisa) manning it.

5.title: Episode #3.5
5.plot: Leighton comes into work in a blazer - Richard France is taking him to head office to pitch his ideas up there. Gavin thinks this is a bad idea but France doesn't listen.

6.title: Episode #3.6
6.plot: France feels that the staff aren't getting Valco better, so some of them are asked to attend a workshop.

7.title: Episode #3.7
7.plot: Gavin is forced to wear a hoodie saying manager, and France has the door taken off Gavin's office to make him more approachable. And with the building work disrupting the store, Gavin is slowly being driven mad.

8.title: Episode #3.8
8.plot: It's a night shift the store is closed and the staff are doing a final big refit before they re-open. Gavin is horrified when France's wants to take all the signs down and move the stock so that the customers are lost.

9.title: Episode #3.9
9.plot: It's the day of the big reopening and head office turn up for the occasion. Gavin is dismayed when they keep the customers waiting outside for hours but France is waiting for his celeb. Finally she arrives it's Kelly Brook.

10.title: Episode #3.10
10.plot: Gavin's off today - on forced leave. Rumours about his fall-out with France have got around and people are starting to wonder if he's been sacked. Julie is temporarily promoted to manager and she worries that people think she back-stabbed Gavin.

11.title: Episode #3.11
11.plot: Gavin returns and is trying to be a new man. Modern and forward thinking just like France. But it's rather tragic, and also too late, as France has closed ranks and will only speak to Julie.

12.title: Episode #3.12
12.plot: Gavin feels isolated as Julie and Richard appear to be getting on as a team together. Katie is offered a managerial job at Valco, but has a decision to make when an old friend appears. Lisa and Colin are having doubts about their wedding.

13.title: Episode #3.13
13.plot: Supermarket awards are up for grabs and the judges have arrived. France has a cunning plan to win them over. Gavin hands in his resignation, while Anna drops a bombshell on him.

14.title: Christmas Special
14.plot: Julie is offered the manager's job at Widnes. Leighton and Colin are at war with the local boy scouts. Geri Halliwell turns up to do her Christmas shopping. Heavy snow causes disruption for all.

1.title: Episode #4.1
1.plot: Valco's new recruits arrive, but when Colin sees them walking up the aisle, he's horrified when he recognizes one of them.....his very own Nan.

2.title: Episode #4.2
2.plot: Gavin's new assistant, Daniel, starts today and is thrown into the deep-end while Gavin deals with the arrival of the owner of Valco, who's dropping off his daughter, Charlie.

3.title: Episode #4.3
3.plot: Valco is cracking down on counterfeit money, and when Lisa tells Rose that a customer is pulling the wool over Rose's eyes, Rose assaults the customer.

4.title: Episode #4.4
4.plot: Daniel is running first aid training today and Charlie and Brian drive him to breaking point.

5.title: Episode #4.5
5.plot: Freddie Flintoff is launching a party range in Valco today and for the main press event he's bowling to Gavin.

6.title: Episode #4.6
6.plot: Daniel's running the store when head office announce the canteen is no longer free. The staff are not impressed so Charlie takes them all out to lunch to take the heat off Daniel.

7.title: Episode #4.7
7.plot: Professional cricketer Freddie Flintoff visits Valco to promote his new food line, Gavin insults him, and Freddie runs off. Maggie and Rose discover something in common. Is Colin really suffering from side effects of a drug test gone wrong?

8.title: Episode #4.8
8.plot: Everybody is doing their part for charity. Gavin is waxing his legs, Sue and Linda are on exercise bikes, and Lisa is filling up the swear jar. But who will win the car in the raffle? And love is in the air.

1.title: Episode #5.1
1.plot: The staff at Valco are worried when rivals Lauda open up nearby. Lauda's staff are in advertising, and their new store Manager Cheryl has a big impact on Gavin. An old face returns with a new job.

2.title: Episode #5.2
2.plot: The launch of new discount store "Lauder" a few doors away from Valco has resulted in the store being empty and so Gavin and Daniel make a plan of action to get their customers back. Also a familiar face returns to Valco.

3.title: Episode #5.3
3.plot: Gavin's boss Brendan pays the store a visit, annoyed by Gavin allowing Lauda to open up nearby. Brendan, Gavin and Daniel hatch a plan to undercut the competition, but Cheryl is once again up to the challenge.

4.title: Episode #5.4
4.plot: Linda runs into an old boyfriend, upsetting Neville. Meanwhile Charlie discovers that Daniel was a contestant on the X-Factor.

5.title: Episode #5.5
5.plot: Linda forgets Sue's birthday. Things heat up between Gavin and Cheryl. Things cool down between Daniel and Charlie.

6.title: Episode #5.6
6.plot: Somebody gets fired. Colin tries his hand at blackmail. Heather runs the tasting station. Things are tense between Sue and Linda, and hot between Gavin and Cheryl.

7.title: Episode #5.7
7.plot: It's a battle of wills between Katie and Lisa. Margaret's inability to identify fruit sends Brian on a spider hunt. And who tampered with Gavin's email?

8.title: Episode #5.8
8.plot: Valco's 50th anniversary and everyone dresses up like it's the 60's. Neville has a question for Linda. Gavin and Cheryl get locked in the freezer and have to find a way to keep warm. Finally, is there a new couple in the making?

9.title: A Christmas Carol
9.plot: It's Christmas Eve and Gavin is doing is best Scrooge impersonation. An old friend drops by for a visit. Colin is a surprisingly good Santa. But who is Frank?

1.title: Episode #6.1
1.plot: The search for the new Valco area manager is finally over. Gavin's thoughts turn to the amount of cheap unhealthy food that Valco sells.

2.title: Episode #6.2
2.plot:

locations: Theobalds Park, Cheshunt, Hertfordshire, England, UK
imdb.plot outline: Set in Valco, a fictional supermarket in the north-west of England, Trollied is an eight-part sitcom that puts a comic twist on one of our most familiar surroundings. Acting deputy manager Julie struggles to assert her authority and fails at almost every attempt to make a good impression on store manager Gavin. She also has something of a crush on Gavin, who manages to rebuff her clumsily executed flirtations - that is, if he's aware of them at all.
imdb.title: Trollied
plot: Set in Valco, a fictional supermarket in the north-west of England, _Trollied_ (qv) is an eight-part sitcom that puts a comic twist on one of our most familiar surroundings. Acting deputy manager Julie struggles to assert her authority and fails at almost every attempt to make a good impression on store manager Gavin. She also has something of a crush on Gavin, who manages to rebuff her clumsily executed flirtations - that is, if he's aware of them at all.::Ccoyle
